name: Heavenly Hammer
description:
Heavenly Hammer is an action game about the battles of flying machines armed with huge blades, saws and hammers. The combat system is designed so that every mouse movement corresponds to the movement of your deadly weapon. You will feel the weight and strength of each blow! Thanks to the fun physics, unique combat system, a variety of weapons and enemies, the game generates a huge number of interesting situations and allows you to develop your own fighting style.



Shoot down enemy cars to score points, pump up your flying car and unlock stunningly beautiful drawings of women's bodies that diversify the graphics and help you relax ;) Or do you want to disable them and focus on the gameplay? As you wish!



Immerse Yourself In Heavenly Hammer



  • Funny physics
  • Convenient mouse control
  • Hand-drawn graphics
  • A variety of weapons and enemies
  • Upgrade your flying car
  • Twenty amazing drawings!
